des: "Amazing on top of your favorite pancakes or waffles. This sauce doesn't thicken up much because there is no white sugar, but it does soak wonderfully into warm pancakes."
ins: Combine blueberries, water, honey, lemon zest, and salt in a saucepan over medium heat. Cover; bring to a simmer. Remove lid; simmer until liquids combine, about 15 minutes. Remove from heat; cool for 5 minutes.
